title: [45w#14&m#3][BGM]团结一致[题目机翻]
author: 45gfg9
txt_content:
本帖最后由 45gfg9 于 2017-3-1 21:07 编辑 

仍然bgm...
http://music.163.com/style/swf/widget.swf?sid=1941907&type=2&auto=1&width=320&height=66

Put your hands in the air
挥舞双手
If you hear me out there
如果你听到我的呼唤
I've been looking for you day and night
我曾日日夜夜寻找你的身影
Shine a light in the dark
在黑暗中燃起一丝光亮
Let me see where you are
让我看见你在何方
'Cause I'm not gonna leave you behind
因为我永远不会离开你
If I told you that you're not alone
如果我告诉你你不是孤单一人
And I show you this is where you belong
然后向你展示你真正的归宿
Put your hands in the air
挥舞双手
One more time
再一次





同...另附海报一张...

话说我如果一直这样发50个bgm贴怎么样XD
